saint.name: St. Thérèse of the Child Jesus (Thérèse of Lisieux)
saint.quote: I will spend my heaven doing good on earth.
saint.description: Known as the Little Flower, Thérèse of Lisieux was a Carmelite nun who taught the 'Little Way' of spiritual childhood. Despite dying at age 24, her autobiography 'Story of a Soul' has inspired millions. She was declared a Doctor of the Church in 1997 and is one of the patron saints of missions.
